newsitem.title: USA: Teledata in phone pact with Bezeq.
newsitem.headline: Teledata in phone pact with Bezeq.

text.p: Teledata Communications Ltd Wednesday said it has signed an agreement supply its telephone system to Bezeq, The Israel Telecommunications Corp Ltd.
Under the agreement, Bezeq may purchase up to $5 million of Teledata's Exchange Radio Concentrator systems during 1997. No further details of the pact were disclosed.
The ERC system allows telephone operating companies to provide toll quality voice, voice band data and fax, and ISDN services over radio links.
Deliveries under the frame agreement are subject to firm orders that Bezeq may issue at its discretion during the term of the agreement.

Deployment of the ERC system will enable Bezeq to provide full telephone coverage throughout Israel, Teledata said. This will allow Bezeq to provide immediate response to any customer request for additional services anywhere in Israel.
